TEXT.TITLE: N.Z. OFFICIAL FOREIGN RESERVES FALL IN JANUARY
TEXT.BODY: New Zealand's official foreign reserves fell to 7.15 billion N.Z. Dlrs in January from 7.20 billion dlrs in December and compared with 3.03 billion a year ago period, the Reserve Bank said in its weekly statistical bulletin. Reuter
